BTW.Information:
Best Training Week is a five-day event with incredible workshops covering the most interesting topics in various fields. In addition to gaining new knowledge and motivation, participants will also be able to find friends and colleagues who share their interests.

During the Best Training Week, everyone will have a great opportunity to enjoy interaction with experts and take part in exciting discussions that will help enrich their knowledge and inspire further personal and professional development.

BestInformation.BEST:
BEST (Board of European Students of Technology) is an international non-profit, non-political, youth public organization, which was established in 1989 in Berlin.

Mission – student development BEST helps students achieve an international mindset, a better understanding of cultures and peoples, and develop skills to work in an international environment.

Vision – strength in diversity We understand and respect different cultures and societies. The environment we create supports all people in realizing their potential and acting responsibly.
